## ChildType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ChildType<T> = T extends {
    [Name in keyof Required<Children<any>>]: infer Ret;
} ? Ret : T extends {
    [Name in keyof Required<Children<any>>]?: infer Ret;
} ? Ret : null;
```
